channel.title: Factor-Zero Pk Server [Lumby Pvp] [Memory Leaks FIXED]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i53.tinypic.com/vpb8y1.jpg[/img]
[b]SOURCE DOWNLOAD:[/b]
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?5139cx3m6whdsyu]http://www.mediafire.com/?5139cx3m6whdsyu[/url]
[b]CLIENT DOWNLOAD:[/b]
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?54kt21co8te519a]http://www.mediafire.com/?54kt21co8te519a[/url]
[b]I ran this source for 5 months got over 120 players, I cant even begin to tell you how many bugs I fixed in this, would be a great base to be used for beginners. [img]http://google.com/nophp/smilies/smile.png[/img] Also Pk point farming is 100% stopped in this source, it is impossible to pk point farm unless you have a group of 6+ with all IP changers :P and still then it takes an hour plus to get a point by that method (Tested it with players) so youd be better off pking normally.[/b]
[b]FEATURES[/b]
[left][i]-Takes 5 Minutes To Start Pking And Get Going -Fully Working PvP Point System -Memory Leaks Fixed Thanks To Jinrake -All skills working, trainable skilling area. -Fully Working Dragon Claw Specials -Fully Working Dark Bow Specials -Fully Working Godsword Specials -Fully Working PvP Timer When Entering Safe Zones -Fully Working 100% Clan Chat With Lootshare -Weapon Stats Powered Correctly, No Weapon Overpowered More Than It Should Be -Toggle Gameframes Between 474, 484, 508, and 525 -All PvP Armour -Working PvP Tasks, Complete Them For Rewards -Click For 1k Barrage Casts, 1k Veng Runes, Bolts And Food -4 Bosses That All Drop Useful Pking Items Such As Claws, DFS, Ranger Boots, Elemental Shield, Robin Hood And More -Donaters Tab, Allows Donaters To Recharge Special, Acces Bank From Anywhere, And Restore Hitpoints. NOTE: It does not allow you to use these in PvP Zones -Server Hosted On A VPS 100% Uptime -Minor And Major Updates To Keep Server Fresh (Were Being Serious This Isnt BS Like Other Servers) -Every Skill Works 100% -Perfect Pking, Added Working Timers -Friendly Staff Who Know What Their Doing, No Noobs That Bought Staff -Hoilday Events, And Server Events -Stable Economy -Working Rushing -Webclient and Desktop Client -Donaters Recieve Items Within 24 Hours -Working Mime Random Event + Sand which Lady[/i][/left]
[img]http://i54.tinypic.com/wtd27d.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2vubu6a.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i55.tinypic.com/x3u7fq.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i53.tinypic.com/2qkmcmq.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/2sbqr90.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i281.photobucket.com/albums/kk201/silabk0ed/train.gif[/img]
[img]http://i56.tinypic.com/4hw5fs.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i281.photobucket.com/albums/kk201/silabk0ed/Untitled-2.gif[/img]
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/33lglm0.png[/img]
[img]http://i281.photobucket.com/albums/kk201/silabk0ed/dags-2.png[/img]
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/28clt05.jpg[/img]
[b]POST FEEDBACK[/b] [/center]

item.title: Factor-Zero Pk Server [Lumby Pvp] [Memory Leaks FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

[quote=“FFkingdom, post:15, topic:417631”]I am sorry, I know this is over the limit of days and is considered grave-digging. But I wanted to check this out, and see what it was all about, and when it downloaded I was given a warning by my antivirus stating it had blocked a trojan. when I scanned the .rar file, I got the image below.

Is there something in this I/we should know about that would set off the antivirus? especially on the status of Trojan?

2edtkd1.png720×360
[/quote]
unrar it, it can’t harm yet when nothing is executed. So we can see which the problem is, who knows it’s just an auto restarted

Read full topic

item.title: Factor-Zero Pk Server [Lumby Pvp] [Memory Leaks FIXED]
item.dc:creator: @onexan onexan
item.description:
@onexan wrote:

[center]

vpb8y1.jpg725×95

SOURCE DOWNLOAD:

http://www.mediafire.com/?5139cx3m6whdsyu

CLIENT DOWNLOAD:

http://www.mediafire.com/?54kt21co8te519a

I ran this source for 5 months got over 120 players, I cant even begin to tell you how many bugs I fixed in this, would be a great base to be used for beginners.
Also Pk point farming is 100% stopped in this source, it is impossible to pk point farm unless you have a group of 6+ with all IP changers and still then it takes an hour plus to get a point by that method (Tested it with players) so youd be better off pking normally.

FEATURES

[left]-Takes 5 Minutes To Start Pking And Get Going
-Fully Working PvP Point System
-Memory Leaks Fixed Thanks To Jinrake
-All skills working, trainable skilling area.
-Fully Working Dragon Claw Specials
-Fully Working Dark Bow Specials
-Fully Working Godsword Specials
-Fully Working PvP Timer When Entering Safe Zones
-Fully Working 100% Clan Chat With Lootshare
-Weapon Stats Powered Correctly, No Weapon Overpowered More Than It Should Be
-Toggle Gameframes Between 474, 484, 508, and 525
-All PvP Armour
-Working PvP Tasks, Complete Them For Rewards
-Click For 1k Barrage Casts, 1k Veng Runes, Bolts And Food
-4 Bosses That All Drop Useful Pking Items Such As Claws, DFS, Ranger Boots, Elemental Shield, Robin Hood And More
-Donaters Tab, Allows Donaters To Recharge Special, Acces Bank From Anywhere, And Restore Hitpoints. NOTE: It does not allow you to use these in PvP Zones
-Server Hosted On A VPS 100% Uptime
-Minor And Major Updates To Keep Server Fresh (Were Being Serious This Isnt BS Like Other Servers)
-Every Skill Works 100%
-Perfect Pking, Added Working Timers
-Friendly Staff Who Know What Their Doing, No Noobs That Bought Staff
-Hoilday Events, And Server Events
-Stable Economy
-Working Rushing
-Webclient and Desktop Client
-Donaters Recieve Items Within 24 Hours
-Working Mime Random Event + Sand which Lady[/left]

wtd27d.jpg760×497

2vubu6a.jpg763×502

2sbqr90.jpg773×557

28clt05.jpg519×576

POST FEEDBACK
[/center]

Read full topic
